listening() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientHandler
The first time the method is launched it links a SendMessageToServer object to the view.

loadCards() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
This method does the parsing of the cards
loadDataPlayer(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ViewGUIController
This method is used to ask name and age to the player and then to send this data to the server when the user click on the buttonDataPlayer Button
loadNPlayer(ActionEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.ViewGUIController
This method is called when the user insert the player number and click the buttonNplayer Button to send to the server the input
